==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|綿|貫}}

===Etymology===
Unclear. Homophonous with {{m|ja|綿抜き|tr=watanuki||getting out of quilted clothing → changing into summer clothing}}, and with {{m|ja|腸抜き||the act of gutting fish or poultry; gutted fish or poultry}}.

The kanji used may be an example of [[ateji]].
